content.question: If subsidies for research and development on new technologies lead to an increase in the average productivity of labor, what will most likely happen to real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita and long-run aggregate supply <math alttext="open parenthesis, L R A S, close parenthesis" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mtext>LRAS</mtext><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> for a given population size?

choices.label: Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita will decrease, and <math alttext="L R A S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>LRAS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will increase.

Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita will decrease, and <math alttext="L R A S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>LRAS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will decrease.

Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita will increase, and <math alttext="L R A S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>LRAS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will increase.

Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita will increase, and <math alttext="L R A S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>LRAS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will decrease.

Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita will decrease, and <math alttext="L R A S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>LRAS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will not change.

content.answer: Real <math alttext="G D P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>GDP</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> per capita will increase, and <math alttext="L R A S" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>LRAS</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> will increase.
